title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Understanding Learner Behavior Changes in the Pandemic Era and Community of Inquiry (CoI)-Based One

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three CoI (Community of Inquiry)-based online communication strategies to compensate for the reduction in social interaction caused by the pandemic.
Learners can design and implement a self-directed learning roadmap in a mobile environment for 8 weeks or more.
Learners can collaborate with peers to produce a social change analysis report and incorporate feedback through collaborative project execution.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
